rationale: The IG focuses on real-time location systems (RTLS) and defines FHIR messages for enrolling/unenrolling tags and reporting location updates, which is a form of device communication within the infrastructure domain. It uses FHIR messaging and defines specific profiles for data exchange. The IG is not specific to a particular geographic location and is intended for general use. It focuses on data coming from RTLS devices and is presented as a draft.
